text: Ðis synd þa landgemære æt eowlan gelade.
Of bladene andlang riþiges<../images/tbar.gif>on fugel mære midne.
Of fulgel mere<../images/tbar.gif>on þone oþerne fugel mere.
Of gild beorh andlang sealtstræte to þan stane.
Of þan stane to þan oþeran stane<../images/tbar.gif>swa to þan þriddan stane, & to þan feorðan stane.
Of þam stane to þære grenan stige.
Of þære stige to lafercan beorh.
Of lafercan beorh on þone ealdan weg<../images/tbar.gif>ofer þone broc<../images/tbar.gif>eft on þone ealdan weg.
Of þam ealdan wege<../images/tbar.gif>forð onlang dune a bi heafdan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þan ealdan slo.
Of þan slo to þan lytlan beorhe, of þan beorge on<../images/tbar.gif>sic.
Ondlong sices ofer þone broc to heort wellan.
Of heort wellan to hwete wellan, & þreo æceras earðlandes of hwete wellan a bi þan earðlande to þan to brocenan beorge.
Of þan beorge forð on geriht on þæt sic.
Of þam sice be þan heafdan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to mules hlawe, & þreo æceras þonne adune andlang þære furh þæt cymð to bladene.
Swa andlang bladene<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð eft to eowlan gelade.
